titleStmt.title: A relation concerning the particulars of the rebellion lately raised in Muscovy by Stenko Razin its rise, progress, and stop : together with the manner of taking that rebel, the sentence of death passed upon him, and the execution of the same.

notesStmt.note: The relation dated, p. 18: Arch-Angel, Sept. 23, 1671 on board of the ship, the Queen Esther.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
